verses.verse: Praise <WH1984> the Lord! <WH3050> For it is good <WH2896> to sing <WH2167> praises <WH2167> to our God; <WH430> For it is pleasant <WH5273> [and] praise <WH8416> is becoming. <WH5000>
The Lord <WH3068> builds <WH1129> up Jerusalem; <WH3389> He gathers <WH3664> the outcasts <WH5080> of Israel. <WH3478>
He heals <WH7495> the brokenhearted, <WH7665> <WH3820> And binds <WH2280> up their wounds. <WH6094>
He counts <WH4487> the number <WH4557> of the stars; <WH3556> He gives <WH7121> names <WH8034> to all <WH3605> of them.
Great <WH1419> is our Lord, <WH136> and abundant <WH7227> in strength; <WH3581> His understanding <WH8394> is infinite. <WH369> <WH4557>
The Lord <WH3068> supports <WH9388> the afflicted; <WH6035> He brings <WH8213> down <WH8213> the wicked <WH7563> to the ground. <WH776>
Sing <WH9420> to the Lord <WH3068> with thanksgiving; <WH8426> Sing <WH2167> praises <WH2167> to our God <WH430> on the lyre, <WH3658>
Who covers <WH3680> the heavens <WH8064> with clouds, <WH5645> Who provides <WH3559> rain <WH4306> for the earth, <WH776> Who makes grass <WH2682> to grow <WH6779> on the mountains. <WH2022>
He gives <WH5414> to the beast <WH929> its food, <WH3899> [And] to the young <WH1121> ravens <WH6158> which <WH834> cry. <WH7121>
He does not delight <WH2654> in the strength <WH1369> of the horse; <WH5483> He does not take <WH7521> pleasure <WH7521> in the legs <WH7785> of a man. <WH376>
The Lord <WH3068> favors <WH7521> those who fear <WH3372> Him, Those who wait <WH3176> for His lovingkindness. <WH2617>
Praise <WH9576> the Lord, <WH3068> O Jerusalem! <WH3389> Praise <WH1984> your God, <WH430> O Zion! <WH6726>
For He has strengthened <WH2388> the bars <WH1280> of your gates; <WH8179> He has blessed <WH1288> your sons <WH1121> within <WH7130> you.
He makes <WH7760> peace <WH7965> in your borders; <WH1366> He satisfies <WH7646> you with the finest <WH2459> of the wheat. <WH2406>
He sends <WH7971> forth His command <WH565> to the earth; <WH776> His word <WH1697> runs <WH7323> very <WH5704> swiftly. <WH4120>
He gives <WH5414> snow <WH7950> like wool; <WH6785> He scatters <WH6340> the frost <WH9214> like ashes. <WH665>
He casts <WH7993> forth His ice <WH7140> as fragments; <WH6595> Who <WH4310> can stand <WH5975> before <WH6440> His cold <WH7135>?
He sends <WH7971> forth His word <WH1697> and melts <WH4529> them; He causes His wind <WH7307> to blow <WH5380> and the waters <WH4325> to flow. <WH5140>
He declares <WH5046> His words <WH1697> to Jacob, <WH3290> His statutes <WH2706> and His ordinances <WH4941> to Israel. <WH3478>
He has not dealt <WH6213> thus <WH3651> with any <WH3605> nation; <WH1471> And as for His ordinances, <WH4941> they have not known <WH3045> them. Praise <WH1984> the Lord! <WH3050>
